con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="OAuth ${#Project#access_token}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> <con:entry key="Accept" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:testCase.name: Context TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [Context] located at [/v1/context/hp/sf]

con:config.script:
import net.sf.json.groovy.*
//Get the response from the GET registrations call def responseMessage = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["POST /v1/OAuth2?"].testRequest.response.contentAsString def json = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) def access = json.access_token testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("access_token",access) log.info access

import net.sf.json.groovy.*
//Get the response from the GET registrations call def responseMessage = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["POST /v1/OAuth2?"].testRequest.response.contentAsString def json = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) def access = json.access_token testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("access_token",access) log.info access

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="OAuth ${#Project#access_token}"/> <con:entry key="Accept" value="application/json"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
import net.sf.json.groovy.*
//Get the response from the GET registrations call def responseMessage = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Login"].testRequest.response.contentAsString def json = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) def pwdtoken = json.access_token testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("pwdtoken",pwdtoken) log.info pwdtoken

import net.sf.json.groovy.*
//Get the response from the GET registrations call def responseMessage = testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Login"].testRequest.response.contentAsString def json = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) def accountId = json.userid testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("accountId",accountId) log.info accountId

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="OAuth ${#Project#pwdtoken}"/> <con:entry key="Accept" value="application/json"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>
